details:
Umoci modifies Open Container images. Umoci intends to be a complete manipulation tool for OCI images. In particular, it should be seen as a more end-user-focused version of the oci-image-tools provided by the OCI.

Security Fix(es):

Open Container Initiative umoci before 0.4.7 allows attackers to overwrite arbitrary host paths via a crafted image that causes symlink traversal when "umoci unpack" or "umoci raw unpack" is used.(CVE-2021-29136)
